alert.note: Alert for Eastern Orleans; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 1:56PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Bernard and central Orleans Parishes through 245 PM CDT... At 155 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near East New Orleans, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds near 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, East New Orleans, Chalmette, Arabi, Meraux and Lakefront Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 238 and 253. Interstate 510 between mile markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Orleans; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans
